channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: « Eh bien, Mullvad a été censuré au Royaume-Uni » : ce VPN voit ses publicités sur la surveillance d’Internet interdites
item.description: Mesure sévère mais juste ou dérive inquiétante ? Au Royaume-Uni, les élus s'apprêtent à interdire l'accès des VPN aux mineurs de moins de 15 ans. Un contexte de recul des droits numériques dans lequel Mullvad VPN s'est littéralement vu réduit au silence.

item.title: Dans cette entreprise, refuser d’utiliser l’IA, c’est s’assoir sur son augmentation de salaire
item.description: Pour espérer grimper les derniers échelons de la direction, les cadres supérieurs de ce géant du conseil n'ont désormais plus le choix : ils doivent prouver qu'ils maîtrisent et utilisent régulièrement les outils d'IA.

item.title: Amazon is shutting down King of Meat, promising a 'full refund' for 'all players'
item.description: King of Meat is shutting down after less than a year on the market.

item.title: Amazon Games is winding down King of Meat
item.description: King of Meat's reign is ending. The game will end service on April 9, less than a year after its October 2025 debut. The Amazon Games-published title will be playable until that date, but will then be taken entirely offline. "Despite the creativity and innovation Glowmade brought to King of Meat, the game has unfortunately not found the audience we hoped for," the announcement read. Developer Glowmade had high hopes for King of Meat, its debut game, but it fell starkly short of expectations. The developer wanted a concurrent player count of at least 100,000, but peaked at 320, according to I...

item.title: The Best Laptop Tote Bags to Buy (2026), WIRED-Tested and Reviewed
item.description: From travel days to board meetings, these laptop totes are designed to protect your valuables, and then some.

item.title: Google Pixel Watch (and other Wear OS users) just got a potentially life-saving new upgrade
item.description: Wear OS users can get earthquake alerts on watch – even if you're nowhere near your phone.

item.title: Samsung 65QN90F : l’un des TV les plus lumineux du marché voit son prix chuter drastiquement après 40 % de remise
item.description: Le TV Samsung 65QN90F est un modèle Mini-LED qui nous a clairement impressionnés : dalle ultra-lumineuse, fonctionnalités gaming complètes, design très élégant... Bref, voilà une référence qui a tout bon. Actuellement, Son-Vidéo le propose d'ailleurs à 1 390 euros au lieu de 2 290 euros grâce à un code promo.

item.title: Want premium PS5 accessories for less? These Nacon controllers, as well as my favorite wireless gaming headset, are $50 off or better at PS Direct and Amazon
item.description: Several Nacon PS5 accessories have been discounted at PS Direct, including the Revolution 5 Pro controller and my favorite wireless gaming headset.

item.title: L’énigme des « bonhommes de neige » de l’espace trouve enfin une piste solide
item.description: La mission New Horizon, après son formidable succès avec ses images de Pluton, a découvert il y a plus d'une décennie le premier représentant d'une population d'étranges astéroïdes binaires en contact. Depuis, les astrophysiciens tentent de trouver la clé de l'énigme de leur origine.

item.title: Volkswagen cartonne, Renault confirme et Tesla poursuit sa chute : sacré début d’année dans les ventes de voitures électriques en Europe
item.description: En ce début d'année 2026, le marché européen des voitures électriques connaît une recomposition. Volkswagen conserve son trône, mais c'est désormais Renault et Skoda qui jouent les trouble-fêtes, pendant que Tesla poursuit une descente aux enfers.

item.title: Apple will soon make (some) Mac Minis in the US
item.description: Apple is preparing to move some of its Mac Mini production to the US as part of the company's ongoing efforts to appease the Trump administration's push for domestic investment. Manufacturing is set to begin later this year in north Houston, Texas, at a Foxconn facility that currently assembles Apple's AI servers. "Apple is deeply […]

item.title: How to tell if your child is a victim of cyberbullying
item.description: How to tell if your child’s online activities have exposed them to cyberbullying, and how to address this problem and prevent future incidents.

item.title: The US military will reportedly use Elon Musk's Grok AI in its classified systems
item.description: The US Department of Defense has reportedly reached a deal to use Elon Musk's Grok in its classified systems, according to Axios. That follows news that the Pentagon is currently in a dispute with another AI company, Anthropic, over limits on its technology for things like mass surveillance. Last year, the White ordered Grok, along with ChatGPT, Gemini and Anthropic's Claude to be approved for government use. Up until now, though, only Anthropic's model has been allowed for the military's most sensitive tasks in intelligence, weapons development and battlefield operations. Claude was reportedl...

item.title: The Righteous EV Owners Who Won’t Let Their Broken Cars Die
item.description: Fisker went out of business in 2024, but its biggest fans want to bring the “right to repair” to the masses.

item.title: AI Will Never Be Conscious
item.description: In his new book, A World Appears, Michael Pollan argues that artificial intelligence can do many things—it just can’t be a person.

item.title: College Campuses Are in Upheaval Over Faculty Ties to Epstein
item.description: From small art schools to large public universities, the new DOJ release of emails reveals just how deep the financier’s influence in academia went. Students are demanding accountability.

item.title: Inside Anthropic’s existential negotiations with the Pentagon
item.description: Anthropic's weekslong battle with the Department of Defense has played out over social media posts, admonishing public statements, and direct quotes from unnamed Pentagon officials to the news media. But the future of the $380 billion AI startup comes down to just three words: "any lawful use." The new terms, which OpenAI and xAI have […]

item.title: Inside the polarizing return of low-rise jeans
item.description: Love it or hate it, waistlines are getting lower, and it’s actually great for business. By now, you’ve surely noticed it. Jean waistlines, sky-high not so long ago, are going lower. Low enough that you might need to think of underwear as outerwear.

item.title: Why leaders need to stop confusing transparency with clarity
item.description: If the information lacks direction, confusion follows, and productivity goes down the drain. In 2001, Antoni was working at a business that was underperforming and facing layoffs. People didn’t know who would be cut or when. You could tell by people’s behavior that anxiety was at an all-time high. Managers were “networking” in the right corridors, colleagues started to crowd meetings to look indispensable, and teams were slowing down because nobody wanted to make the wrong move....

item.title: These interview questions can tell you whether someone is the right fit
item.description: It can be tricky to determine whether a new hire’s character is a good fit for your team. Ask questions that invite vulnerability and connection. Hiring well is one of a leader’s most important jobs. Having talented employees is a strong competitive advantage and allows your organization to produce results and create a productive and positive culture....

item.title: The U.S. Army can’t escape the internet’s surveillance machine
item.description: A West Point study found that military networks are flooded with corporate trackers, including some linked to foreign entities. U.S. Army personnel may be training for cyberwar, but their own web browsing is quietly feeding the surveillance economy.

item.title: This 'powerhouse' robot vacuum can clean even deep-pile carpets with ease — and it’s finally available in the UK
item.description: We rated this Roborock bot as one of the very best robot vacuums for carpet.

item.title: This simple, science-backed approach is the best way to motivate workers
item.description: Workplace unhappiness is rampant. Here’s one way to fight it. There’s a new epidemic sweeping companies worldwide: unhappiness. According to recent research, only 51% of employees frequently feel happy at work.

item.title: Firefox déploie son nouveau bouton pour se débarrasser de l’IA
item.description: Les multiples critiques des utilisateurs réfractaires à l’intelligence artificielle ont su trouver un écho chez Mozilla. La nouvelle version de Firefox dispose d’un bouton permettant de couper toutes les fonctions liées de près ou de loin à l’IA.

item.title: Chantage sur Revolut : un ex-employé a utilisé les données clients pour extorquer des cryptos
item.description: Un ex-employé de Revolut a profité de ses anciens accès internes pour tenter de faire chanter un célèbre trader crypto. L'ancien salarié n'a pas hésité à menacer toute la famille du spéculateur. L’affaire, désormais entre les mains de la police, relance les inquiétudes autour des données traitées par les services financiers en ligne...

item.title: +80 % de ventes en janvier 2026 : les voitures chinoises explosent en Europe dans un marché à la baisse
item.description: Alors que le marché européen a reculé de 3,6 % en janvier 2026, les constructeurs chinois, eux, ont augmenté de 80 % leurs ventes en Europe. Un résultat impressionnant pour une offre maintenant adaptée à la demande qu’elle rencontre.

item.title: Spotlight on affordable in-ceiling speakers: the solution you hear, but rarely see
item.description: Q Acoustics' trio of in-ceiling speakers can make your music come from above

item.title: Cette directrice de Meta a vu toute sa boîte mail supprimée par OpenClaw
item.description: C’est une mésaventure que Summer Yue ne risque pas d’oublier. La responsable de la sécurité et de l’alignement IA chez Meta a vu OpenClaw, son agent IA autonome, supprimer l’intégralité de sa boîte mail malgré les ordres lui interdisant de le faire.

item.title: Report Details the Sketchy Technique Allegedly Inflating Valuations of AI Companies
item.description: The economics of AI investments are starting to look unsettling, even for investors.

item.title: Jimmy Kimmel responds to Trump attacking him in a fundraising email
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel has responded to Trump attacking him in a recent fundraising email sent to his followers.

item.title: Why does my robot vacuum suck now? Well, whens the last time you cleaned it?
item.description: If your robot vacuum is making a weird noise or just pushing dirt around, it might not be broken. It could just need a hygiene routine.

item.title: Act fast to score the Skyrover S1 Mini Drone for its best-ever price at Amazon — save over $80
item.description: As of Feb. 24, the Skyrover S1 Mini Drone is on sale at Amazon for $268.99. This is a 23% discount from its list price of $349.

item.title: Netflix jette l’éponge ? Paramount révèle son offre ultime pour le rachat de Warner Bros. Discovery
item.description: Chose promise, chose due. Après une énième offre de rachat refusée par le conseil d'administration de Warner Bros. Discovery, Paramount vient de soumettre son offre ultime, en ce moment examinée par le géant du divertissement. Le rachat de Warner Bros. pourrait connaître un virage inattendu.

item.title: How to navigate a boss who keeps changing priorities
item.description: Dealing with shifting expectations creates friction for any employee—and too much of it puts you on the path to burnout. Three weeks into her new role as VP of operations, “Maria” got an 11:47 p.m. Slack from her COO: “Where are we on the Q3 supply chain numbers?” She had sent him those numbers that morning. She sent them again.

item.title: Amazon fait chuter le prix AirPods 4 équipés de la réduction de bruit à seulement 149 €, c’est inédit !
item.description: Les AirPods 4 sont des écouteurs parfaits pour venir se greffer dans l'écosystème d'Apple où vous pourrez bénéficier du Dolby Atmos sur Apple Music. Chez Amazon, ils perdent 50 euros de leur prix pour tomber à 149 euros.

item.title: AMD Zen 6 : date de sortie reportée à 2027 pour les prochaines processeurs Ryzen ?
item.description: Les premiers processeurs AMD Zen 6 arriveraient bien sur le marché courant 2026, comme prévu, mais ceux qui nous intéressent le plus (comprenez les modèles grand public « Olympic Ridge ») subiraient quant à eux un « report » fâcheux... à 2027.

item.title: Verizon is giving away the new Google Pixel 10a for free — heres how to get yours
item.description: If you pre-order the Pixel 10a through Verizon, you'll get it for free when you open a new line.

item.title: Apple will start making Mac minis in the US
item.description: Starting later this year, Apple will start manufacturing Mac minis meant for sale in the US within the country. The company took The Wall Street Journal on a tour of its Houston facility, where Foxconn is also building servers for Apple Intelligence, and was shown an empty warehouse. Apple says it will turn the space into a 220,000 square feet plant where it will produce the compact desktop computers. The decision to produce Mac minis for local sales within the US is part of the company’s efforts to make good on its pledge last year that it will spend $500 billion in the US over the next four...

item.title: Rachat de Warner Bros. : négociations, Netflix vs Paramount et HBO Max, tout comprendre à la situation
item.description: C'est l'un des temps forts de cette fin d'année. Le rachat de Warner Bros. Discovery par Netflix s'est transformé en véritable feuilleton avec l'arrivée de Paramount dans les négociations. Faisons le point sur la situation.

item.title: Trop chère et peu utile : après Mercedes, BMW tire un trait sur sa conduite autonome de niveau 3
item.description: Après Mercedes-Benz qui vient d’annoncer la fin de son Drive Pilot, c’est au tour de BMW de dire adieu à sa conduite autonome de niveau 3. Un changement qui interviendra sur sa Série 7 restylée, prévue pour avril 2026.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 : une meilleure autonomie mais une batterie moins endurante
item.description: À l’aube de l’annonce des Samsung Galaxy S26, une nouvelle fuite nous livre des informations sur les batteries de cette nouvelle gamme. Si on peut s’attendre à une meilleure autonomie sur tous les modèles, la longévité de la batterie laisserait à désirer.

item.title: The best webcams for 2026
item.description: Whether you’re on back-to-back video meetings, live streaming or just trying to look presentable on a family call, your webcam matters more than most might expect. The cameras built into laptops are fine in a pinch, but they rarely deliver consistent image quality, especially in less-than-ideal lighting. A dedicated webcam can noticeably improve sharpness, color accuracy and overall reliability. There’s no single “best” webcam for everyone, though. Some models are built around higher resolutions, while others focus on smoother video, better low-light performance or stronger onboard microphones...

item.title: These are the top 4 robot vacuums for carpet after passing the cat hair test on my rugs
item.description: Which robot vacuums really work on carpets and rugs? These five had the best crumb, lint, and hair pickup on plush and low pile.

item.title: Tesla Goes After California DMV, Suing Over False Advertising Decision
item.description: Tesla claims California "wrongfully and baselessly" branded it a false advertiser over its “Autopilot” and “Full Self-Driving” labels.

item.title: These saunas and spas for frogs could bring a species back from the brink of extinction
item.description: A simple, low-cost tool is designed to fight a disease that’s killing frogs. At a park near Canberra, Australia, a series of small white pyramid-shaped boxes are part of a new experiment: Can “frog saunas” help bring back an endangered species?

item.title: ‘I thought about folding’: How limited healthcare access cripples solopreneurs
item.description: Independent workers may struggle to grow their businesses amid hefty premiums, narrow networks, and frustrating work-arounds. Roger Sauerhaft thought he had done everything right. The 38-year-old PR consultant had been running his solo practice in New York since 2021, paying $1,189 a month for what seemed like good health insurance through his state’s individual marketplace. ...

item.title: Trump’s plan to circumvent European internet content bans is a geopolitical nightmare
item.description: A planned U.S. government website to subvert European content blocks could cause an almighty row. A year ago at the Munich Security Conference, Vice President JD Vance accused Europe of using “ugly, Soviet-era words like misinformation and disinformation” to justify restricting dissent, and warned that its speech rules posed a greater threat to democracy than Russia or China....

item.title: Amazon’s CEO just made a scary prediction for 2026. Economists worry he’s right
item.description: Consumers are hoping life will get more affordable in 2026. Administration policies make that unlikely. Last year was full of talk about tariffs. Are they coming up or going down? On which products and countries? How could businesses handle all the uncertainty? But while there was a lot of discussion of these fees, paid on imported goods and raw materials, there wasn’t actually that much evidence of their price impact at stores. According to Amazon CEO Andy Jassy, that’s about to change. ...

item.title: Double sacoche, plateforme avant et repose-pied : Decathlon dégaine une série d’accessoires pour son nouveau longtail électrique

item.title: Google Messages change radicalement la création de conversations
item.description: Google Messages revoit l'interface de ses nouvelles discussions. Fini le bouton dédié aux groupes, l'application mise tout sur la sélection multiple.
